titleStmt.title: A remonstrance of the Kirk of Scotland, and the message from the States, with divers passages of their proceedings concerning the Kings Majestie, and the Estates answer to the Kirk of Scotland. VVith other occurrences of note certified in papers from the Scots quarters in Newcastle. Printed by the originall papers, and published according to order of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: S. T.
England and Wales. Parliament.
Scotland. Parliament.
Church of Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E.E. according to order,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
